title: Provo City Center Temple
description: A beautifully restored temple in the heart of downtown Provo.

title: Bridal Veil Falls
description: A scenic waterfall accessible via a short walk in Provo Canyon.

title: Provo River Parkway
description: A popular trail for walking, running, and biking along the scenic Provo River.

title: Bean Life Science Museum
description: A free museum with wildlife exhibits and educational programs located on BYU campus.

title: Rock Canyon
description: A favorite for rock climbing, hiking, and exploring nature close to the city.

title: Downtown Provo
description: A vibrant area filled with shops, restaurants, and live music venues.

title: Provo Recreation Center
description: A modern facility with pools, gym, fitness classes, and family activities.

title: Peaks Ice Arena
address: 100 N Seven Peaks Blvd, Provo, UT 84606
description: An Olympic venue turned community rink offering public skating and hockey events.
